local_events.name: Pre-Easter preparations in local churches
local_events.description: Villages begin preparing for Easter celebrations with church decorations and special services

local_events.name: Early spring fishing season
local_events.description: Local fishermen active with spring catch, fresh seafood available in restaurants

local_events.name: Hiking season preparation
local_events.description: Trail maintenance and clearing completed, official hiking season approaching

translations.de: Das frühe Frühlingswetter in den Cinque Terre bringt milde Temperaturen, aber wechselhafte Bedingungen. Ideal zum Wandern mit der richtigen Ausrüstung, aber zu kühl für Strandaktivitäten. Weniger Menschenmengen machen dies zu einer ruhigen Zeit zum Erkunden.
translations.en: Early spring weather in Cinque Terre brings mild temperatures but variable conditions. Ideal for hiking with proper gear, though too cool for beach activities. Fewer crowds make this a peaceful time to explore.
translations.fr: Le temps du début du printemps dans les Cinque Terre apporte des températures douces mais des conditions variables. Idéal pour la randonnée avec un équipement approprié, bien que trop frais pour les activités de plage. Moins de foule rend cette période paisible pour explorer.
translations.it: Il tempo di inizio primavera nelle Cinque Terre porta temperature miti ma condizioni variabili. Ideale per escursioni con l'attrezzatura adeguata, anche se troppo fresco per attività balneari. Meno folla rende questo un periodo tranquillo per esplorare.

local_tips: Check trail conditions - some may be muddy after winter
Book accommodations in advance - limited winter options
Train service reliable but verify schedules
Early morning hikes offer best weather windows
best_activities: Hiking the coastal trails (Via dell'Amore, Blue Trail)

cons: Some restaurants/hotels may still be closed
visiting_conditions.rating_explanation: Mild spring weather beginning to emerge, though still cool and variable. Good for hiking but layers essential.

local_events.seasonal_notes: This period marks the transition from winter to spring, with nature beginning to awaken but tourism infrastructure still in low season mode.
typical_events: Pre-Easter preparation activities in local churches
Lemon pruning season in terraced gardens
Off-season local festivals in nearby La Spezia

translations.de: Anfang März bringt kühle Temperaturen und gelegentliche Schauer nach Cinque Terre. Packen Sie warme, wasserdichte Kleidung ein und genießen Sie weniger Menschenmengen beim Erkunden der Küstendörfer.
translations.en: Early March brings cool temperatures and occasional showers to Cinque Terre. Pack warm, waterproof layers and enjoy fewer crowds while exploring the coastal villages.
translations.fr: Le début mars apporte des températures fraîches et des averses occasionnelles aux Cinque Terre. Emportez des vêtements chauds et imperméables et profitez de moins de foule en explorant les villages côtiers.
translations.it: L'inizio di marzo porta temperature fresche e piogge occasionali alle Cinque Terre. Portate vestiti caldi e impermeabili e godetevi meno folla esplorando i borghi costieri.

visitor_guidance.local_insights: Early March is still off-season with fewer crowds and some restaurants may have limited hours. Many accommodation options offer lower rates. The famous Sentiero Azzurro (Blue Trail) may have sections closed due to weather conditions.

historical_context.climate_notes: March 2nd typically sees the gradual warming trend of late winter, though temperatures remain cool. The Mediterranean influence moderates extreme cold, but moisture from Atlantic weather systems can bring periodic rainfall.
historical_context.tourism_season: Low season - many seasonal businesses closed or operating reduced hours

conditions.description: partly cloudy with occasional light showers

visiting_rating.reasoning: Moderate conditions for visiting. Cool temperatures and potential rain require preparation, but fewer crowds and authentic local atmosphere. Indoor activities and village exploration still very rewarding.

best_activities: Visit local museums and indoor attractions in Monterosso
Explore the colorful village streets and architecture
Photography of dramatic coastal views between rain showers
Visit Cinque Terre National Park visitor centers
activities_to_avoid: Extended hiking on exposed coastal trails
visitor_guidance.local_considerations: Early March is off-season; many seasonal restaurants and some accommodations may still be closed. Ferry services between villages typically resume mid-March. Trail conditions can be muddy and slippery.
packing_recommendations: Light scarf and gloves for morning/evening

summary_translations.de: Der 3. März in Cinque Terre bietet typisches Frühlingswetter mit kühlen Temperaturen (8-14°C), mäßiger Regenwahrscheinlichkeit und Südwestwinden. Nebensaison mit wenigen Touristen, aber eingeschränkte Dienstleistungen. Ideal für Indoor-Erkundungen und authentische lokale Erfahrungen.
summary_translations.en: March 3rd in Cinque Terre features typical early spring weather with cool temperatures (8-14°C), moderate chance of light rain, and southwest winds. Off-season period with minimal crowds but some services may be limited. Best for indoor exploration and authentic local experiences.
summary_translations.fr: Le 3 mars aux Cinque Terre présente un temps typique de début de printemps avec des températures fraîches (8-14°C), une probabilité modérée de pluie légère et des vents du sud-ouest. Période de basse saison avec peu de touristes mais certains services peuvent être limités. Idéal pour l'exploration intérieure et les expériences locales authentiques.
summary_translations.it: Il 3 marzo alle Cinque Terre presenta il tipico clima primaverile con temperature fresche (8-14°C), moderata possibilità di pioggia leggera e venti di sud-ovest. Periodo di bassa stagione con pochi turisti ma alcuni servizi potrebbero essere limitati. Ideale per esplorazioni indoor ed esperienze locali autentiche.

translations.de: Kühler Frühlingstag in Cinque Terre mit teilweise bewölktem Himmel und milden Temperaturen. Ideal zum Wandern und Erkunden der Dörfer mit leichter Schichtkleidung. Wenige Touristen machen dies trotz kühlerer Bedingungen zu einer ruhigen Reisezeit.
translations.en: Cool early spring day in Cinque Terre with partly cloudy skies and mild temperatures. Ideal for hiking and village exploration with light layers. Low tourist crowds make this a peaceful time to visit despite cooler conditions.
translations.fr: Journée printanière fraîche aux Cinque Terre avec un ciel partiellement nuageux et des températures douces. Idéal pour la randonnée et l'exploration des villages avec des vêtements légers en couches. Peu de touristes font de cette période un moment paisible pour visiter malgré des conditions plus fraîches.
translations.it: Giornata primaverile fresca alle Cinque Terre con cielo parzialmente nuvoloso e temperature miti. Ideale per escursioni ed esplorare i borghi con abbigliamento a strati leggero. Pochi turisti rendono questo un periodo tranquillo per visitare nonostante le condizioni più fresche.

local_context.seasonal_notes: Early spring transition period with variable weather patterns typical of Mediterranean coastal regions
typical_events: Pre-Lenten celebrations may still be occurring
Early spring maintenance of coastal paths

conditions.wind: Light to moderate westerly winds 10-15 km/h

sea_temperature.description: Cool, suitable for brief immersion only

visiting_rating.reasoning: Moderate conditions with cool temperatures but generally pleasant for hiking and sightseeing. Lower tourist crowds are a significant advantage, though some seasonal limitations apply.

best_activities: Indoor wine tasting and local cuisine
Museum visits during any shower periods
special_considerations: Some hiking trails may be muddy from winter rains
Restaurants and accommodations have limited hours
Ferry services may be irregular due to sea conditions
Perfect for photography with dramatic sky conditions
clothing_recommendations: Comfortable walking shoes with good grip
Light sweater or fleece for evening
Scarf and light gloves for early morning/evening

translations.DE: Kühler Frühlingstag mit gelegentlichen leichten Schauern. Gut zum Wandern und für kulturelle Erkundungen, aber warme Schichten für wechselnde Bedingungen einpacken.
translations.EN: Cool early spring day with occasional light showers. Good for hiking and cultural exploration, though pack warm layers for changeable conditions.
translations.FR: Journée printanière fraîche avec des averses légères occasionnelles. Bon pour la randonnée et l'exploration culturelle, mais emportez des couches chaudes pour les conditions changeantes.
translations.IT: Giornata primaverile fresca con occasionali piogge leggere. Buona per escursioni e esplorazioni culturali, ma porta vestiti a strati per condizioni variabili.

overall_rating.description: Decent for hardy travelers and off-season enthusiasts. Cool weather with occasional rain, but fewer crowds and authentic local atmosphere.

temperature.description: Cool early spring temperatures with mild afternoons

precipitation.description: Occasional light showers, typical for March transition period

sea_temperature.description: Cool Mediterranean waters, still winter temperatures

best_activities: Hiking the Cinque Terre trails (fewer crowds)
Indoor museum visits and local food experiences

local_events.cultural_notes: Quiet season for cultural events, focus on natural beauty and local traditions

translations.de: Kühler Frühlingstag mit möglichen leichten Regenschauern. Gut zum Wandern mit entsprechender Ausrüstung, aber Schwimmen wegen kalter Meerestemperaturen nicht empfohlen.
translations.en: Cool early spring day with chance of light rain. Good for hiking with proper gear, but swimming not recommended due to cold sea temperatures.
translations.fr: Journée printanière fraîche avec possibilité d'averses légères. Bonne pour la randonnée avec un équipement approprié, mais baignade déconseillée en raison des températures froides de la mer.
translations.it: Giornata primaverile fresca con possibilità di piogge leggere. Buona per escursioni con attrezzatura adeguata, ma nuoto sconsigliato a causa delle temperature marine fredde.

visitor_guidance.local_notes: Early March is shoulder season - fewer crowds, some seasonal restaurants may still be closed. Check operating hours for attractions.
what_to_pack: Warm hat and gloves for early morning/evening
visitor_guidance.conditions_summary: Cool early spring weather with potential for light rain. Good for hiking but pack layers and rain protection.

translations.de: Kühler Frühlingstag mit gelegentlichen Schauern und Südwestwinden. Ideal für Dorferkundungen und kulturelle Aktivitäten drinnen. Schichtweise anziehen und Regenschutz mitbringen.
translations.en: Cool spring day with occasional showers and southwest winds. Ideal for village exploration and indoor cultural activities. Layer up and bring rain protection.
translations.fr: Journée printanière fraîche avec averses occasionnelles et vents du sud-ouest. Idéale pour explorer les villages et les activités culturelles en intérieur. S'habiller en couches et apporter une protection contre la pluie.
translations.it: Giornata primaverile fresca con piogge occasionali e venti di sudovest. Ideale per esplorare i borghi e attività culturali al coperto. Vestirsi a strati e portare protezione dalla pioggia.

overall_rating.explanation: Moderate conditions with cool temperatures and possible showers. Good for exploring villages and indoor activities, though hiking may be challenging. Excellent for authentic experiences with fewer crowds.

summary_translations.de: Der 8. März in Cinque Terre bietet angenehmes Frühlingswetter mit Temperaturen bis zu 15°C. Erwarten Sie teilweise bewölkten Himmel mit möglichen leichten Schauern. Ideal zum Wandern und Dörfer erkunden, aber zu kühl für Strandaktivitäten. Schichtkleidung und wasserdichte Kleidung einpacken.
summary_translations.en: March 8 in Cinque Terre offers pleasant early spring weather with temperatures reaching 15°C/59°F. Expect partly cloudy skies with possible light showers. Ideal for hiking and village exploration, but too cool for beach activities. Pack layers and waterproof clothing.
summary_translations.fr: Le 8 mars aux Cinque Terre offre un climat printanier agréable avec des températures atteignant 15°C. Attendez-vous à un ciel partiellement nuageux avec de possibles averses légères. Idéal pour la randonnée et l'exploration des villages, mais trop frais pour les activités de plage. Emportez des vêtements en couches et imperméables.
summary_translations.it: L'8 marzo alle Cinque Terre offre un piacevole clima primaverile con temperature fino a 15°C. Aspettatevi cieli parzialmente nuvolosi con possibili pioggerelle leggere. Ideale per escursioni ed esplorare i borghi, ma troppo fresco per attività balneari. Portate abbigliamento a strati e impermeabile.

local_events.name: Pre-Easter preparations in local churches
local_events.description: Traditional religious preparations visible in village churches

local_events.name: Early season restaurant reopenings
local_events.description: Many seasonal restaurants begin reopening for spring

translations.DE: Frühlingswetter mit milden Temperaturen, perfekt zum Wandern. Kühle und wechselhafte Bedingungen mit möglichen leichten Regenschauern. Ideal für kulturelle Aktivitäten und Küstenspaziergänge.
translations.EN: Early spring weather with mild temperatures perfect for hiking. Cool and variable conditions with possible light showers. Ideal for cultural activities and coastal walks.
translations.FR: Temps printanier avec des températures douces parfaites pour la randonnée. Conditions fraîches et variables avec possibles averses légères. Idéal pour les activités culturelles et les promenades côtières.
translations.IT: Tempo primaverile con temperature miti perfette per le escursioni. Condizioni fresche e variabili con possibili pioggerelle leggere. Ideale per attività culturali e passeggiate costiere.

tips: Check weather updates for rain timing
Restaurants may have limited outdoor seating
Hiking trails can be muddy after rain
Fewer crowds make this ideal for photography

recommended: Local restaurant and wine bar tours

visiting_conditions.description: Good conditions for hiking and cultural activities, though cool for beach activities

local_events.seasonal_notes: March marks the transition period before peak tourist season, with many businesses preparing for Easter celebrations

Artisan workshops reopening for tourist season

local_considerations: Early spring season - some tourist facilities may have reduced hours
Trails can be muddy and slippery after rain
Fewer crowds make for better photography opportunities

summary_translations.DE: Der 10. März in Cinque Terre bietet mildes Frühlingswetter mit Temperaturen um 12°C. Erwarten Sie teilweise bewölkten Himmel mit möglichen leichten Schauern. Gute Bedingungen für Dorferkundungen, packen Sie jedoch Schichten und wasserdichte Kleidung ein. Das Meer bleibt kühl zum Schwimmen.
summary_translations.EN: March 10th in Cinque Terre offers mild spring weather with temperatures around 12°C (54°F). Expect partly cloudy skies with a chance of light showers. Good conditions for village exploration, though pack layers and waterproof clothing. Sea remains cool for swimming.
summary_translations.FR: Le 10 mars aux Cinque Terre offre un temps printanier doux avec des températures autour de 12°C. Attendez-vous à un ciel partiellement nuageux avec des averses légères possibles. Bonnes conditions pour explorer les villages, mais prévoyez des vêtements en couches et imperméables. La mer reste fraîche pour la baignade.
summary_translations.IT: Il 10 marzo nelle Cinque Terre offre un clima primaverile mite con temperature intorno ai 12°C. Aspettatevi cieli parzialmente nuvolosi con possibili pioggerelle leggere. Buone condizioni per esplorare i borghi, ma portate vestiti a strati e abbigliamento impermeabile. Il mare rimane fresco per nuotare.

local_events: Pre-Easter religious preparations in local churches
Early spring wine cellar openings
Preparation for upcoming Festa di San Giuseppe (March 19)
Local fishermen's early season activities

translations.de: Kühles Frühlingswetter mit gelegentlichen Regenschauern. Ausgezeichnete Zeit zum Wandern und für kulturelle Erkundungen bei weniger Menschenmassen, aber zu kühl für Strandaktivitäten.
translations.en: Cool early spring weather with occasional showers. Excellent time for hiking and cultural exploration with fewer crowds, though too cool for beach activities.
translations.fr: Temps frais de début de printemps avec des averses occasionnelles. Excellente période pour la randonnée et l'exploration culturelle avec moins de foule, mais trop frais pour les activités de plage.
translations.it: Tempo fresco di inizio primavera con piogge occasionali. Periodo eccellente per escursioni ed esplorazioni culturali con meno folla, ma troppo fresco per attività balneari.

what_to_pack: Warm layers (fleece or light wool sweater)
Comfortable walking shoes with good grip
best_activities: Hiking the coastal trails (less crowded, dramatic misty views)
Photography of moody seascapes and terraced vineyards
Indoor activities like local museums and churches
Enjoying hearty Ligurian cuisine in cozy restaurants
activities_to_avoid: Planning only outdoor activities without backup plans

items.detailed_assessment: Mid-March offers a quieter Cinque Terre experience with fewer crowds and lower accommodation costs, but cooler temperatures and higher chance of rain. The dramatic coastal scenery takes on a moody, atmospheric quality perfect for photography. Hiking trails are accessible but can be slippery when wet. This is an ideal time for cultural exploration and experiencing local life, though beach activities are not suitable due to cool temperatures.
items.weather_description: Early spring weather with cool temperatures and occasional light showers. Morning fog is common along the coast, clearing to partly cloudy skies. Moderate humidity with gentle southwestern breezes from the Mediterranean.

local_events: Early spring vineyard maintenance activities visible on terraces
Local restaurants beginning to extend outdoor seating
Traditional fishing activities increase with improving weather
Preparation period for Easter celebrations (varies by year)

translations.DE: Mildes Frühlingswetter mit gelegentlichen Schauern. Perfekt zum Wandern und Erkunden der Dörfer bei angenehmen Temperaturen und weniger Menschenmassen.
translations.EN: Mild spring weather with occasional showers. Perfect for hiking and exploring villages with comfortable temperatures and fewer crowds.
translations.FR: Temps printanier doux avec des averses occasionnelles. Parfait pour la randonnée et l'exploration des villages avec des températures agréables et moins de foule.
translations.IT: Tempo primaverile mite con occasionali pioggerelle. Perfetto per escursioni ed esplorare i borghi con temperature gradevoli e meno folla.

what_to_pack: Light scarf for evening coastal walks
avoid_activities: Outdoor dining without cover during potential showers
recommended_activities: Hiking the Sentiero Azzurro coastal trail
Photography tours of colorful village architecture
Wine tasting at local terraced vineyards
Exploring village centers and local markets
Boat tours between villages (weather permitting)
Visiting churches and historical sites

items.rating_explanation: Good conditions for active travelers. Pleasant hiking weather with fewer crowds than summer. Some weather variability requires flexible planning.
items.conditions_description: Mid-March brings the awakening of spring to Cinque Terre with mild, variable weather. Expect partly cloudy skies with occasional light showers and pleasant daytime temperatures perfect for hiking. The Mediterranean is still cool but refreshing.

local_events.name: Pre-Easter preparations
local_events.description: Local churches and communities begin Easter preparations with special religious observances

local_events.name: Early spring fishing season
local_events.description: Traditional fishing activities resume with better weather, fresh catch available in local restaurants

translations.de: Mitte März bringt Cinque Terre mildes Frühlingswetter mit gelegentlichen Schauern. Packen Sie Schichten und Regenschutz für komfortable Dorferkundungen während dieser ruhigeren Nebensaison.
translations.en: Mid-March in Cinque Terre brings mild spring weather with occasional showers. Pack layers and rain protection for comfortable village exploration during this quieter shoulder season.
translations.fr: La mi-mars aux Cinque Terre apporte un temps printanier doux avec des averses occasionnelles. Emportez des couches et une protection contre la pluie pour explorer confortablement les villages pendant cette saison intermédiaire plus calme.
translations.it: A metà marzo le Cinque Terre offrono un clima primaverile mite con piogge occasionali. Porta vestiti a strati e protezione dalla pioggia per esplorare comodamente i borghi durante questa stagione intermedia più tranquilla.

typical_weather.conditions: partly cloudy with occasional light showers

visitor_guidance.local_tips: March is shoulder season with fewer tourists. Many seasonal restaurants and accommodations may still be closed. Check opening hours in advance. The famous Sciacchetrà dessert wine pairs perfectly with the cooler weather.
what_to_pack: Comfortable walking shoes with good grip
best_activities: Indoor museum visits and local restaurants
Shopping for local products and souvenirs

festivals: Preparation period for Easter celebrations (varies by year)
typical_events: Wine cellar openings after winter closure

translations.de: Mäßiges Frühlingswetter mit gelegentlichem Regen. Gut für Wanderungen und Dorferkundungen, aber Schichtkleidung und Regenschutz einpacken.

translations.it: Tempo primaverile moderato con piogge occasionali. Buono per escursioni ed esplorazioni dei borghi, ma portare abbigliamento a strati e protezione dalla pioggia.

visiting_conditions.summary: Moderate conditions with typical March variability. Good for cultural activities and covered sightseeing, but weather can be unpredictable. Fewer crowds make it peaceful for exploration.

travel_notes.transportation: Train service running normally, ferry service limited due to season and sea conditions
travel_notes.best_time_of_day: Late morning to early afternoon (10:00-15:00) for warmest temperatures and best light
travel_notes.photography_tips: Excellent lighting for dramatic coastal shots, especially after rain showers clear
travel_notes.trail_conditions: Generally good but may be muddy after rain - waterproof footwear essential
travel_notes.restaurant_availability: Many restaurants open but with limited spring hours - check ahead

temperature.description: Cool but pleasant spring temperatures with mild daytime warmth

precipitation.description: Occasional light showers typical of spring transition

visitor_guidance.crowd_levels: Low to moderate - pre-Easter period with fewer tourists

visitor_guidance.clothing_recommendations: Dress in layers with waterproof outer layer. Spring weather can be variable - warm in sun, cool in shade or when cloudy.

multilingual_summary.de: Der 15. März in Cinque Terre bietet angenehme Frühlingsbedingungen mit milden Temperaturen um 15°C, gelegentlichen leichten Schauern und weniger Menschenmassen. Perfekt zum Wandern und Erkunden der Dörfer mit angemessener Regenausrüstung.
multilingual_summary.en: March 15th in Cinque Terre offers pleasant spring conditions with mild temperatures around 15°C, occasional light showers, and fewer crowds. Perfect for hiking and exploring villages with proper rain gear.
multilingual_summary.fr: Le 15 mars aux Cinque Terre offre d'agréables conditions printanières avec des températures douces autour de 15°C, d'occasionnelles averses légères et moins de foule. Parfait pour la randonnée et l'exploration des villages avec un équipement de pluie approprié.
multilingual_summary.it: Il 15 marzo nelle Cinque Terre offre piacevoli condizioni primaverili con temperature miti intorno ai 15°C, occasionali pioggerelle leggere e meno folla. Perfetto per escursioni ed esplorare i borghi con adeguata attrezzatura antipioggia.

typical_weather.conditions: Partly cloudy with occasional light showers

visitor_guidance.local_events: Traditional spring festivals may begin in surrounding Ligurian villages. Local restaurants start featuring spring ingredients and Easter preparations begin.
what_to_pack: Comfortable walking shoes with good grip
activities_to_avoid: Long exposed coastal hikes during rain
visitor_guidance.clothing_recommendations: Early spring layers essential - temperatures can vary significantly throughout the day. Waterproof outer layer recommended due to March shower patterns.

summary_translations.DE: Mitte März bietet Cinque Terre kühles Frühlingswetter mit Temperaturen um 13°C. Erwarten Sie teilweise bewölkten Himmel mit gelegentlichen leichten Schauern, typisch für die Jahreszeit. Packen Sie Schichten und Regenschutz ein. Gut für Dorferkundungen und Indoor-Aktivitäten, beim Wandern ist Vorsicht auf möglicherweise nassen Wegen geboten.
summary_translations.EN: Mid-March in Cinque Terre offers cool spring weather with temperatures around 13°C (55°F). Expect partly cloudy skies with occasional light showers typical for the season. Pack layers and rain protection. Good for village exploration and indoor activities, though hiking requires caution on potentially wet trails.
summary_translations.FR: Mi-mars aux Cinque Terre offre un temps printanier frais avec des températures autour de 13°C. Attendez-vous à un ciel partiellement nuageux avec des averses légères occasionnelles typiques de la saison. Emportez des vêtements en couches et une protection contre la pluie. Idéal pour explorer les villages et les activités en intérieur, la randonnée nécessite de la prudence sur des sentiers potentiellement humides.
summary_translations.IT: A metà marzo nelle Cinque Terre il tempo primaverile è fresco con temperature intorno ai 13°C. Aspettatevi cieli parzialmente nuvolosi con occasionali pioggerelle leggere tipiche della stagione. Portate vestiti a strati e protezione dalla pioggia. Ideale per esplorare i borghi e attività al coperto, escursioni richiedono cautela su sentieri potenzialmente bagnati.

conditions_assessment.boat_trips: Moderate - weather dependent, may be cancelled due to wind and waves
conditions_assessment.crowding_level: Low - shoulder season with few tourists
conditions_assessment.dining_outdoors: Limited - indoor dining preferred, some covered terraces usable
conditions_assessment.hiking_conditions: Fair - trails can be muddy and slippery after rain, but manageable with proper footwear
conditions_assessment.photography_conditions: Good - dramatic lighting with clouds and occasional clear spells

summary_multilingual.de: Mitte März bietet mildes Frühlingswetter in Cinque Terre mit Temperaturen um 16°C. Erwarten Sie teilweise bewölkten Himmel mit gelegentlichen leichten Schauern. Perfekt zum Wandern und Erkunden mit weniger Menschenmassen, aber packen Sie Schichten und Regenschutz ein. Das Meer ist noch zu kalt zum Schwimmen.
summary_multilingual.en: Mid-March offers mild spring weather in Cinque Terre with temperatures around 16°C. Expect partly cloudy skies with a chance of light showers. Perfect for hiking and exploring with fewer crowds, though pack layers and rain protection. Sea is still cold for swimming.
summary_multilingual.fr: Mi-mars offre un temps printanier doux aux Cinque Terre avec des températures autour de 16°C. Attendez-vous à des cieux partiellement nuageux avec des possibilités d'averses légères. Parfait pour la randonnée et l'exploration avec moins de foule, mais emportez des vêtements en couches et une protection contre la pluie. La mer est encore froide pour la baignade.
summary_multilingual.it: Metà marzo offre un clima primaverile mite alle Cinque Terre con temperature intorno ai 16°C. Aspettatevi cieli parzialmente nuvolosi con possibilità di pioggerelle leggere. Perfetto per escursioni ed esplorazioni con meno folla, ma portate vestiti a strati e protezione dalla pioggia. Il mare è ancora freddo per nuotare.

translations.de: Angenehmes Frühlingswetter mit milden Temperaturen und geringer Regenwahrscheinlichkeit. Ausgezeichnet zum Wandern mit weniger Touristen.
translations.en: Pleasant spring weather with mild temperatures and low chance of rain. Excellent for hiking with fewer tourists.
translations.fr: Temps printanier agréable avec des températures douces et peu de risque de pluie. Excellent pour la randonnée avec moins de touristes.
translations.it: Piacevole tempo primaverile con temperature miti e bassa probabilità di pioggia. Eccellente per escursioni con meno turisti.

translations.DE: Der 19. März bietet angenehmes Frühlingswetter in Cinque Terre mit milden Temperaturen um 14°C. Teilweise bewölkter Himmel mit möglichen leichten Schauern. Gute Bedingungen zum Wandern und Erkunden der Dörfer mit weniger Menschenmengen als in der Hochsaison. Schichten und leichten Regenschutz einpacken.
translations.EN: March 19 offers pleasant spring weather in Cinque Terre with mild temperatures around 14°C (57°F). Partly cloudy skies with possible light showers. Good conditions for hiking and exploring villages with fewer crowds than peak season. Pack layers and light rain protection.
translations.FR: Le 19 mars offre un temps printanier agréable aux Cinque Terre avec des températures douces autour de 14°C. Ciel partiellement nuageux avec possibles averses légères. Bonnes conditions pour la randonnée et l'exploration des villages avec moins de foule qu'en haute saison. Prévoir des couches et une protection légère contre la pluie.
translations.IT: Il 19 marzo offre un piacevole clima primaverile nelle Cinque Terre con temperature miti intorno ai 14°C. Cielo parzialmente nuvoloso con possibili piogge leggere. Buone condizioni per escursioni ed esplorare i borghi con meno folla rispetto all'alta stagione. Portare vestiti a strati e protezione leggera dalla pioggia.

summary_translations.de: Ende März bietet angenehm mildes Frühlingswetter in Cinque Terre mit Temperaturen um 13°C. Aspettatevi condizioni variabili con occasionali pioggerelle leggere ma generalmente buon tempo per le escursioni. Portate abbigliamento a strati e impermeabili per esplorare comodamente i borghi costieri.
